transcripts.text: Shalom, friends.  One of the words we use in Israel every day is the word todah.  It means thank you.  So as somebody gives you something or as you request something, you can say the word todah, thank you.  Now, if somebody gives you something really special, like a beautiful gift that means a lot to you, you can add the word rabah, which means great.  So great thanks, todah rabah.  So next time somebody gives you something or you ask for something and you receive it, you can say, or.
